mapper.insert:
insert into essay(essay_id,essay_title,essay_cnt,essay_date,essay_filter,essay_like_count,essay_view_count,essay_del,essay_meal_exp,essay_traffic_exp,essay_room_exp,essay_other_exp,mem_id,tripplan_id) values('ess'||lpad(ess_seq.nextval, 5, 0),#{essay_title},#{essay_cnt},sysdate,#{essay_filter},0,0,'N',#{essay_meal_exp},#{essay_traffic_exp},#{essay_room_exp},#{essay_other_exp},#{mem_id},#{tripplan_id})
select 'ess'||lpad(ess_seq.currval, 5, 0) from dual
mapper.select: select rownum rnum, myessay.* from ( select * from essay where mem_id = #{mem_id} order by essay_date asc ) myessay where rownum between 1+((to_number(#{page})-1)*10) and (to_number(#{page})*10) order by rnum desc
select count(rownum) from ( select * from essay where mem_id = #{mem_id} order by essay_date asc ) myessay order by rownum desc

select essay_id , essay_title, essay_cnt, essay_date, tripplan_image from ( select * from essay e, tripplan tp where essay_del = 'N' and e.tripplan_id = tp.tripplan_id order by essay_id desc ) where rownum <=6

select rownum rnum , essay_id , essay_title, essay_cnt, essay_date, tripplan_image, totalmoney, mem_nick, mem_profile, (select count(*) from likes WHERE LIKE_REL_ART_ID = essay_id) essay_like_count, essay_view_count, mapmark_sido, mapmark_sigungu from ( select essay_id , essay_title, essay_cnt, essay_date, tripplan_image, (essay_meal_exp+essay_traffic_exp+essay_room_exp+essay_other_exp) totalmoney, mem_nick, mem_profile, essay_view_count, mapmark_sido, mapmark_sigungu from essay e, tripplan tp, member m, triparea ta, mapmarker mm where essay_del = 'N' and m.mem_id = e.mem_id and e.tripplan_id = tp.tripplan_id and mm.triparea_id = ta.triparea_id and ta.triparea_order = 1 and ta.tripplan_id = tp.tripplan_id order by totalmoney asc ) where rownum <=100

SELECT rrnum.* FROM( SELECT e.ESSAY_DATE , e.ESSAY_CNT , e.ESSAY_ID , e.ESSAY_TITLE , e.ESSAY_VIEW_COUNT , t.TRIPPLAN_IMAGE ,rownum rnum , likeNum.* FROM essay e inner join ( select count(*) as essay_like_count ,LIKE_REL_ART_ID from likes WHERE FILTER_id = 'essay' GROUP BY LIKE_REL_ART_ID ) likeNum on (likeNum.LIKE_REL_ART_ID = e.essay_id ) inner join likes l on (likeNum.LIKE_REL_ART_ID = l.LIKE_REL_ART_ID and l.mem_id = #{mem_id})inner join TRIPPLAN t on(e.TRIPPLAN_ID = t.TRIPPLAN_ID) inner join member m on(e.mem_id = m.mem_id) where e.essay_DEL = 'N'
and ${search_title} like '%' || #{tag_search} || '%')rrnum where rrnum.rnum between #{pageVo.page}*#{pageVo.pageSize}-(#{pageVo.pageSize}-1) and #{pageVo.page}*#{pageVo.pageSize}

select count(*) from essay e inner join ( select count(*) as COUNT ,LIKE_REL_ART_ID from likes WHERE FILTER_id = 'essay' GROUP BY LIKE_REL_ART_ID ) likeNum on (likeNum.LIKE_REL_ART_ID = e.essay_ID) inner join likes l on (likeNum.LIKE_REL_ART_ID = l.LIKE_REL_ART_ID and l.mem_id = #{mem_id}) where e.essay_DEL = 'N'
and e.MEM_ID like '%' || #{tag_search} || '%'
